attributes.action: ensure fair, reasonable and cost effective provision of communications in Saint Helena
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Saint Helena communications are operated by a monopoly namely Cable & Wireless Communications PLC, who charge such extortionate prices for their services as to render Saint Helena unable to compete on a global level. With the UK government funded air access project imminent it is in the interest of the UK tax payer to ensure that this situation is not able to prevail.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
